item.title: 7 Useful Interactive Charts in R (with sample code)
item.description: Introduction An interactive chart gives a lot of freedom to both presenter and the audience. Interactive graphs allow you to share complex ideas in a more engaging way. Using interactive charts allows users to perform actions like choosing a variable, zoom-in, zoom-out, hover to get tooltip, take a snapshot, and more. In this section, I will walk you through some of the packages and functions which we can use to plot different types of interactive plots.
